Question: Why did the lady in white move her hands when she was talking?

Reference Answer: 0

Video ID: 8029969533

Original program:

```
ANSWERS0=VQA(video=VIDEO,question="Why is the lady in white moving her hands while talking?")
ANSWER0=SELECT(question="Why did the lady in white move her hands when she was talking?",information=ANSWERS0,choices=CHOICES)
FINAL_RESULT=RESULT(var=ANSWER0)
```
